actions.transcript: Nope! You've been super helpful.
actions.system_transcript: My pleasure! Enjoy your new dress

actions.transcript: How much is this item going for?
actions.system_transcript: This skirt from Yogi Fit costs $160.

actions.transcript: Oh nice, does it come in blue too?
actions.system_transcript: Unfortunately, at this time we only have it in black.

actions.transcript: Just my luck. What sizes can I get it in?
actions.system_transcript: Currently, we have sizes XXL, S, XS, and XL.

actions.transcript: Could you add one in a size XL to my cart, please?
actions.system_transcript: Absolutely! This skirt in size XL is now in your cart.

actions.transcript: Thanks! That's all I need, so I'll be going now!
actions.system_transcript: You are welcome! Have a great day.

actions.transcript: Tell me more about that silver skirt from earlier! I liked it a lot
actions.system_transcript: This silver skirt is a sequined skirt from New Fashion with a customer rating of 4.87.

actions.transcript: Nice! Does it come in small/
actions.system_transcript: It is not available in S but it is available in XS and M.

actions.transcript: I'll take the XS!
actions.system_transcript: Great, I've added an XS to your cart.

actions.transcript: Awesome! Do you have anything else glitzy like that?
actions.system_transcript: I couldn't find any other sequined skirts.

actions.transcript: Alright, thanks very much! I'll stick with the silver one
actions.system_transcript: My pleasure. Goodbye.

actions.transcript: Can you show me details about the black one I was looking at a minute ago?
actions.system_transcript: This is a Art News Today with a 1.55 rating that retails for $50.

actions.transcript: That's pretty low... any other black dresses with higher ratings?
actions.system_transcript: This has a 4.93 rating from Coats & More and retails for $36. What do you think?

actions.transcript: Hm... it's okay. What about the second highest rated?
actions.system_transcript: This is rated at 1.37 and costs $231.

actions.transcript: Wow, that's even lower than the first one I was looking at! Guess i won't be finding my perfect little black dress today. Thanks anyway.
actions.system_transcript: Have a good day.

actions.transcript: Wow, this is so pretty! Does it come in a large?
actions.system_transcript: Yes, this sweater from the Uptown Gallery is available in Large.

actions.transcript: How much is it?
actions.system_transcript: The price is $190.

actions.transcript: Hm, pretty pricey. Is there anything similar under $100?
actions.system_transcript: This black sweater from Cats Are Great costs $33 and is available in large. Do you like it?

actions.transcript: No, I fell in love with the first one, but it's beyond my budget right now.  Could you add it to my wish list please?
actions.system_transcript: Sure, I have added the first sweater to you wish list.

actions.transcript: What is the pattern called on this skirt?
actions.system_transcript: It is a floral mixed print pattern.

actions.transcript: Does this one come in any other colors?
actions.system_transcript: No, this only comes in orange.

actions.transcript: What sizes are available?
actions.system_transcript: Small, extra small, extra-extra-large, medium, and extra-large.

actions.transcript: Could you tell me how much it costs?
actions.system_transcript: It is $27.

actions.transcript: Great. Go ahead and add one in size M to my cart, please.
actions.system_transcript: Alright, I will do that.

actions.transcript: This is cute! Can you tell me how much it is?
actions.system_transcript: This coat from Home Store costs $245 and comes in XL.

actions.transcript: Darn, I need a medium. Do you have anything similar that comes in that size?
actions.system_transcript: This comes in medium. It's from Cats Are Great and costs $152.

actions.transcript: Awesome, I'll take it!
actions.system_transcript: One medium is in your cart. Can I help you with anything else?

actions.transcript: Nope, that's it. Thank you!
actions.system_transcript: Have a good evening.

actions.transcript: I love the peter pan collar on this one, but bodycon dresses aren't super flattering on me. Do you have anything else with a similar neckline?
actions.system_transcript: I don't have any other peter pan neckline-styled dresses to show you, but here's something similar by Downtown Consignment in a high neck style.

actions.transcript: Hm... the style is nice but I'm not a fan of the pattern. Anything else you could show me with high neck or long sleeves?
actions.system_transcript: How about this high neck one by Glam Nails?

actions.transcript: Interesting! Can you tell me the prices and ratings for this one and the first black one?
actions.system_transcript: The black one is $115 and rated 1.5. This one is $254 and rated 2.67. What size are you looking for?

actions.transcript: I'm a medium.
actions.system_transcript: Neither of them comes in a medium.

actions.transcript: Oh well, the ratings are pretty low anyway. Guess it's not my day! Thanks anyway.
actions.system_transcript: You're welcome

actions.transcript: How much is this sweater?
actions.system_transcript: This sweater costs $193.

actions.transcript: Do you have it in XXL?
actions.system_transcript: No, it is available in XS, S, and L.

actions.transcript: Do you have anything that's similar in my size?
actions.system_transcript: This sweater is available in an XL, but I don't have anything similar in XXL.

actions.transcript: Oh OK. How much does this one cost?
actions.system_transcript: This one is $207. It's from Home Store.

actions.transcript: OK, can you add an XL to my cart? I'll just return it if it's too small
actions.system_transcript: Ok, the sweater is added to your cart in size XL.

actions.transcript: What type of sweater is this?
actions.system_transcript: This is a loose-fit, sleeveless v-neck with ribbing at the bottom edge.

actions.transcript: Interesting! What's the customer rating?
actions.system_transcript: Customers give this sweater a 4.83.

actions.transcript: That's high! Who makes it?
actions.system_transcript: It's made by Brain Puzzles.

actions.transcript: What sizes does it come in?
actions.system_transcript: I'm afraid I have it only in XS. Would that work for you?

actions.transcript: Hmm I don't think so. What's the price? It could work for my sister.
actions.system_transcript: The price is $263.

actions.transcript: I'm gonna pass for today, but thanks for your help!
actions.system_transcript: You're welcome. Have a good day.

actions.transcript: This isn't doing it for me. Could you show me the polka dot skirt again?
actions.system_transcript: Here you go. Would you like more information on it?

actions.transcript: Yes. Could you tell me skirt style and hem length?
actions.system_transcript: Sure! This is a loose, a-line skirt with a knee length hem.

actions.transcript: Who makes it?
actions.system_transcript: The brand for the polka dot skirt is 212 Local.

actions.transcript: Do you have anything else from 212 Local?
actions.system_transcript: That is the only item by 212 Local we have.

actions.transcript: Okay I think I'll get it. Do you have a large?
actions.system_transcript: No, it isn't available in large. It is available in S and M.

actions.transcript: Okay never mind. Thanks for your help.
actions.system_transcript: You're welcome.

actions.transcript: I like this floral pattern. Could you tell me how much the skirt costs?
actions.system_transcript: This retails for $111 from River Chateau with a 1.61 rating.

actions.transcript: The price is not bad; the customer rating is kind of low. Anyway, does it come in small?
actions.system_transcript: It does come in small, would you like for me to add one to your cart?

actions.transcript: Yes, please!
actions.system_transcript: One small has been added to your cart. May I do anything else for you today?

actions.transcript: I'd like to see the gray skirt I saw before one more time, if that comes in small, too.
actions.system_transcript: Is this the one you are referring to?

actions.transcript: Yes. Is that a peplum skirt, too? I like peplum skirts.
actions.system_transcript: It is indeed, in a fit and flare style. It retails for $158 with a 3.26 rating.

actions.transcript: And it does come in small, right?
actions.system_transcript: I'm so sorry! I just checked and it's available only in M, L, and XL.

actions.transcript: No problem. I guess I'll just take the black floral one today and then come back another day to look for another one. Thank you!
actions.system_transcript: Thank you, have a great day!

actions.transcript: This is a dress, but I would prefer something darker. Can you show me a darker solid-color dress in a size M?
actions.system_transcript: Of course. I can show you a long-sleeved dress or a dress with an off-the-shoulder neckline.

actions.transcript: Please show me  a long-sleeved dress.
actions.system_transcript: This black dress from Art News Today has long sleeves and comes in a size medium. What do you think?

actions.transcript: I am not quite comfortable with this hem style. Can we go back to the original dress?
actions.system_transcript: Sure! The original dress also comes in a medium. Would you like to know more about it?

actions.transcript: Could you please tell me the price and the customer rating?
actions.system_transcript: The dress costs $176 and has a customer rating of 1.07.

actions.transcript: OMG. I am sorry to have to taken so much of your time, but I will not  buy anything today.
actions.system_transcript: No problem! Have a good day!
